languages.text: "Оно явно было предупреждено, что мы будем проводить опасный ритуал. А значит — будем уязвимы. И оно предприняло диверсию — атаковало мой разум. А мой разум чуть не погубил нас всех".
"It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."
languages.original_text: "Оно явно было предупреждено, что мы будем проводить опасный ритуал. А значит — будем уязвимы. И оно предприняло диверсию — атаковало мой разум. А мой разум чуть не погубил нас всех".

traits.locale_text: "It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."
"It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."
"It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."
"It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."
"It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."

languages.text: «Le habían advertido de que realizaríamos un ritual muy peligroso y que seríamos vulnerables. Por eso intentó sabotearnos atacando mi mente. Ha sido mi mente la que casi nos mata».
languages.original_text: "It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."

traits.locale_text: «Le habían advertido de que realizaríamos un ritual muy peligroso y que seríamos vulnerables. Por eso intentó sabotearnos atacando mi mente. Ha sido mi mente la que casi nos mata».

languages.text: 「我々が危険な儀式を行うことはハッキリ知らされていました。隙だらけになると分かっていたのです。だから私の心を攻撃して我々の妨害を企てました。そして、私の心が全員の命を危なくしたのです」
languages.original_text: "It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."

traits.locale_text: 「我々が危険な儀式を行うことはハッキリ知らされていました。隙だらけになると分かっていたのです。だから私の心を攻撃して我々の妨害を企てました。そして、私の心が全員の命を危なくしたのです」

languages.text: “很显然，它早就得到了警告，知道我们准备举行一场危险的仪式，也知道仪式期间我们会非常脆弱。于是，它打算攻击我的思想，以此消灭我们。我刚刚差点把所有人都害死。”
languages.original_text: "It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."

traits.locale_text: “很显然，它早就得到了警告，知道我们准备举行一场危险的仪式，也知道仪式期间我们会非常脆弱。于是，它打算攻击我的思想，以此消灭我们。我刚刚差点把所有人都害死。”

languages.text: "Es war offenbar gewarnt, dass wir ein gefährliches Ritual ausführen würden. Dass wir verwundbar sein würden. Also wollte es uns mit einem Angriff auf meinen Verstand sabotieren. Und mein Verstand hätte uns beinahe alle getötet."
languages.original_text: "It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."

traits.locale_text: "Es war offenbar gewarnt, dass wir ein gefährliches Ritual ausführen würden. Dass wir verwundbar sein würden. Also wollte es uns mit einem Angriff auf meinen Verstand sabotieren. Und mein Verstand hätte uns beinahe alle getötet."

languages.text: « À l'évidence, la chose savait que nous accomplirions un dangereux rituel et que nous serions vulnérables. Elle a donc cherché à nous saborder en s'attaquant à mon esprit. Et j'ai bien failli nous faire tous tuer. »
languages.original_text: "It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."

traits.locale_text: « À l'évidence, la chose savait que nous accomplirions un dangereux rituel et que nous serions vulnérables. Elle a donc cherché à nous saborder en s'attaquant à mon esprit. Et j'ai bien failli nous faire tous tuer. »

languages.text: "Tehlikeli bir ayin gerçekleştireceğimize, saldırıya açık olacağımıza dair uyarıldığı muhakkak. Bundandır ki zihinlerimize saldırarak bizi sabote etmeye çalıştı. Benim zihnim de neredeyse hepimizin ölümüne neden olacaktı."
languages.original_text: "It had clearly been warned that we would be performing a dangerous ritual. That we would be vulnerable. So it sought to sabotage us by attacking my mind. And my mind almost got us all killed."
